Title: The Battle Joined
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Ronald D. Moore (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Duncan Lacroix
Plot: Jamie's past provides his only hope of survival following the Battle of Culloden; a pregnant Claire attempts to adjust to life in 1940s Boston.
